
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;    
int main()
{
    int N,M,i;
    int test;
    scanf("%d",&test);
    while(test--){
    scanf("%d %d",&N,&M);
    int candies[M];
    for(i=0;i<M;i++)
    scanf("%d",&candies[i]);
    int collec=1;
    int bag=N-1;
    int mincollec=1;
    int minbag=N-1;
    for(i=1;i<M;i++)
    {
        
			int dif=candies[i]-candies[i-1];
			if(dif!=0)
				collec+=dif,bag-=dif;
			else
				collec-=1;

			mincollec=min(mincollec,collec);
			minbag=min(minbag,bag);

			
		}
    
    //for(i=1;i<=M;i++)
    //printf("%d %d %d %d\n",dp[i].currentcollec,dp[i].currentbag,dp[i].mincollec,dp[i].minbag);
  if(mincollec>0 && minbag>=0)
			printf("1\n");
		else if(minbag<=0)
			printf("-1\n");
		else {
			int use=2-mincollec;
			int chng=minbag+mincollec;

			if(use>N || chng<0)
				printf("-1\n");
			else
				printf("%d\n",use);
		}
	}
}
